website_summaries.verdict: No-frills product, but it still delivers the level of quality you'd expect.
pros: Large size of liner at 34 by 18 inches, meaning it fits most cat litter boxes designed for multiple cats
Uses an anti-microbial coating to reduce the odor in the box
Includes a drawstring that simplifies removing the liner
cons: A little thinner and a little smaller than some other liners

customer_reviews.title: it's sturdy enough to hold the litter when I'm lifting it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this product. It does work in that it is large enough to cover the jumbo litter pan that I have, it's sturdy enough to hold the litter when I'm lifting it to discard. The problem I've had with a few of the bags is that my cat was able to (or there was a problem with those particular bags) split the bags right through its center. She still has her claws, so she can poke holes in the bags as well. The bags do hold up when I clean her litter, and they're study as well for lifting. But I may need something a bit thicker, especially since she still has her claws.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues fixed, best bags we have found
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement! The reliability of these bags seems to have been fixed in 2017. I tried them in 2016 and although the materials was durable and did not rip, the seams were splitting on the bottom before the bag was in place on the box. Now that the seam issue is resolved, these are the best bags I have yet to find, and still such a good price. They fit fine on our extra deep cat box, and I knot the plastic tie under the edge of the box to prevent our cat from pulling the edge of the bag up and into the box. These bags turn little box clean up into an easy job.
customer_reviews.author: Go Cats!

customer_reviews.title: High quality liners
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really think the kind of liners mattered until I bought these. These liners are a much higher quality than the bags I normally use. I went back to my normal bags and they feels so much thinner, I feel like they might break. I will be ordering more of these liners.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Small

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these by mistake. Was looking for sifting liners and looked at so many, I didn't realize these were not, I was going to return but the fee was almost as much as the liners so I am keeping to dispose of litter, Used the first one earlier, The shape of these liners is a bit odd, Don't see how they would fit any litter box. Also, the plastic pull ties are a bit flimsy, First one I used, it ripped apart, Not the best, Would not purchase again,
customer_reviews.author: andee

customer_reviews.title: Worst bag i've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Worst bag i've ever bought. My husband went to change out litter bag, as soon as he put these in the litter box they split at the seam. tried multiple ones. I had purchased 2 boxes so we opened the second thinking we got a faulty box, same thing with those. Thankfully we found out when putting them in the boxes and not taking them out when they were full.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It was very thick so I thought it was going to be really good but I am disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used it in my litter box and my cats clawed through the bottom after a few days. I used one in a temporary box made out of cardboard for the neighbors cats. They had put a rip in the side by the next morning and when I lifted the bag out there was litter all over the bottom of the box :( they clawed right through it. It was very thick so I thought it was going to be really good but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive rubbage
customer_reviews.text: Out of my 4 boxes I didn't keep count of how many bags simply split in two but at this price none should. on my LAST box the last 3 bags split as I tried to put in box. Had to go to store to get bags. I'll never get these again.
customer_reviews.author: D Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Many of the bags split open from the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased about 5 boxes of these and the last two contained bags that split open on the bottom and created a massive mess for me. I thought it was a fluke so I tried the remaining bags in the box which all split as well. Then I assumed it was just a bad box so I opened another box and had the same problem with all of the bags. I will never buy these again because I can't trust them.
customer_reviews.author: fritree

customer_reviews.title: Tear resistant!
customer_reviews.text: Thick and holds up. Loved them and used them in a jumbo box but unfortunately not big enough for the super large litter box I just purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: good tough liners, great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have four large indoor cats so we're picky about cat box liners. These do the job well at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M. Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: Durable and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many jumbo litter pan liners over the past 20 years. While all of them claim to be durable, that is not always the case. These liners though come through with their promise. My cats have their claws and I have not had a single tear in any of these liners. I will never buy another brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Weston

customer_reviews.title: Great but need a bigger size for larger litter pan
customer_reviews.text: Love the thickness. These barely fit my litter pans. I had to use elastic from my sewing kit to keep them on the pans. I have 2 nine pound 6 month old kittens. They need large litter pans. Will only buy again if they come in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Catsagt

customer_reviews.title: these are an excellent way to completely change my scooping cat litter once ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I clean my cat boxes 3-4 times each day, these are an excellent way to completely change my scooping cat litter once a month. Before I started using these, it used to be a time-consuming chore to scour and sanitize the box. Now its a breeze! And they're thick enough that they resist tearing. They fit my large rectangular cat boxes well and I can still use the llids.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Pen n pet extra heavy duty liners
customer_reviews.text: these liners are really heavy duty. Very thick. Worked well for my cat's box. The liners are too big for my cats box so I have to modify it a little as I would pretty much with any other liners but in terms are quality and price these are great
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These liners work the best of all liners I have tried. Now I have spread the word and my family and friends are buying them too.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are fine for a regular litter box but was not nearly large enough for my jumbo boxes. But in response to my comments, they created a larger size which worked well. They are sturdy and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: KYKAT

customer_reviews.title: Not jumbo at all
customer_reviews.text: Although they say it's 'jumbo size ' it really isn't. In fact, if you have a tall average size litter box,it wouldn't even work for that. I was hoping to use these for my JUMBO size litter box,but they barely fit my generic sized ones. For the price,I'll juat stick to Johny Cat brand.
customer_reviews.author: norm

customer_reviews.title: Resistant to my cats sharp nails!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased these litter liners and I really like them. They don't have an odor, they are reasonable price and they survive my cats digging around in the litter box with their long sharp nails. The only minor thing I don't like is the draw string. It doesn't work like it should or at least I have difficulty with it. But it doesn't matter I just throw it into another garbage bag and take it out.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: They are so good
customer_reviews.text: The bags are strong don’t brake easily only thing that brakes easily it’s the strip of the bag but I don’t mind it seen these are the only bags my cats are not able to brake on there litter boxes
customer_reviews.author: Sofia abregu

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but not truly jumbo
customer_reviews.text: These seem pretty sturdy and I think they would work well but they are not big enough to fit the Catit jumbo litter box so I can’t use them. Trying to think of a creative alternate use since I foolishly bought the double pack.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine S. McMullen

customer_reviews.title: tough stuff
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have enough that I don't have to keep ordering. I have a large basket and have to stretch the bag, but it works great. Nice and thick so those nails don't go through.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good materials product.
customer_reviews.text: I had never use the box liner before coz I think I can use the trash bags instead but my cats was scratching upthe trash bags then made that dirty and difficult to clean up. I decided to bought this box liners and really impressed with the quality. These was very durable and save my time when I cleaned up.
customer_reviews.author: WISSNEY

customer_reviews.title: Product great for smaller cats.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Cat uses and loves it. The product was inexpensive and quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sis

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Good quality liners with thick plastic that reasonably withstands sharp claws and doesn't cut or tear easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Holland

customer_reviews.title: Not Jumbo By Any Means
customer_reviews.text: While these are very thick and seem to be good quality, they are in no way jumbo. Also, there is no pleating on the bottom of the bags, just a seam so that the liner bunches up. They don't fit the catbox at all. Now I have a bunch of liners I can't use - I'll have to use them as trash bags, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: CLGSF

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, wish they were deeper
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy unfortunately they're too small for my litter boxes
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: These are ill fitting in a large cat pan. While thick, my kitten can still claw straight through so I have to double bag. I wish they laid flatter as opposed to puckering so much.
customer_reviews.author: V. P.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. My cats try but can’t rip these bags!
customer_reviews.author: N. H.

customer_reviews.title: Tears in liners
customer_reviews.text: There were tears in at least half of these. making them unusable. Sad. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: E. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Liners
customer_reviews.text: My cat has ripped through 3 different brands of liners. To shreds! These ripped a bit but not destroyed. Also I have an XL litter box. They fit great and are much more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: NJJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the thickness of this product and have not had any issue with the bag splitting open when disposing of used litter. I will buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These are very thick. My digger cat almost never scratches a hole in them.
customer_reviews.author: Chrlt

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. We are about 1/2 way through ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. We are about 1/2 way through the box and have yet to have my cat shred these liners as she has all other brands. A bit pricey, but worth it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Warren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and heavy duty but my cat still managed to scratch through them a little bit
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Litter box bags
customer_reviews.text: There nice and thick and the biggest I have found but I have an extra jumbo litter box
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Litter bags
customer_reviews.text: What to say about cat litter bags. They are sturdy and hold up well. I haven't had any issues with them fitting my litter box or ripping when I remove them. Arrived quickly and looked as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: EAsy does it.
customer_reviews.text: Makes changing the litter so much easier. No dumping, washing, drying of the box. Quick change of the odoriferous problem. Seems cat claw proof too.
customer_reviews.author: Tom. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Tough as nails
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a couple of months and these bags are holding up well. My old bags would be torn when I went to swap them out. These are tough as nails.
customer_reviews.author: mike blair

customer_reviews.title: The first box was fine but the 2nd box was not
customer_reviews.text: I bought two boxes of these. The first box was fine but the 2nd box was not. EVERY bag split and one was the one bag with the used litter. I want a refund....i'm in wheel chair and imagine when the bag broke and I had to clean up the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than most liners
customer_reviews.text: Stronger than most litter liners and lasted much longer, but my cat was able to tear it. Would have given a 4.5 if I could have.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy liners, almost scratch proof. Ggood fit for larger boxes.
customer_reviews.author: thekneader

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying!
customer_reviews.text: Love these liners from cat's litter box. It is thick. large and does the job. Best of all it has draw strings for easy disposal.
customer_reviews.author: JessNYC

customer_reviews.title: My kitten still scratches a few tiny holes on it ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitten still scratches a few tiny holes on it. But it does its job by preventing clumps sticking to the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Sui Wu

customer_reviews.title: These bags are very thick,
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very thick, thicker than any I've ever bought but the draw strings break and will not draw the bag completely closed
customer_reviews.author: Jo J

customer_reviews.title: Crazy cat lady approved
customer_reviews.text: Super thick and large. Works great for my 2 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong!!!
customer_reviews.text: Strongest ive ever seen! My cats are vicious and these bags lived up to their name. I am super excited i found these!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly young

customer_reviews.title: They work great. no tears
customer_reviews.text: They work great. no tears, easy to fit on and gather to replace with another one. Worker better then scooping twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kittens Love Their Litter Pans!
customer_reviews.text: We recently adopted 4 kittens - yes four! They seem to like their litter pans, and make good use of them.
customer_reviews.author: DeeGee Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Changed Manufacturer - splitting problem fixed
customer_reviews.text: Updated review 2/10/17 - I received a note stating that I would receive two replacement boxes after giving a one-star review for the bottom of the bag splitting. I opened both boxes and checked 3 in each. No problems. :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Booda Dome compatible
customer_reviews.text: These bags are nice and thick. They work just fine with our Booda Dome litter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: K's Picks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't lay flat
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to explain but these bags fit over the large cat litter, but there's way too many folds on the bottom. All the clumps get caught and makes the litter very hard to clean. The material is strong, but takes way to much effort to get everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product it is very sturdy and conveniently holds the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product it is very sturdy and conveniently holds the contents of a 5lb bag of litter. The only problem is I need a bigger size for a large litter box which unfortunately they don't make.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... anyone make a cat liner bags that split so easily at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Why would anyone make a cat liner bags that split so easily at the bottom. I order 2 boxes and everyone split in the middle while or before putting them into the litter box. I would never buy this nor recommend anyone to buy this. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jevorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, second time ordering. My cat has claws and has never ripped through these!
customer_reviews.author: Momma K

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The item did not fit the litter box. The dimensions provided is not accurate. My box is smaller and the bag still did not fit. Will be using the bags as trash bags. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: They stand up to the sharpest claws. No liner has ever work. Very large. They won't work on small litter box
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Paws

customer_reviews.title: Great price. It fits my x-large litter box
customer_reviews.text: Great price. It fits my x-large litter box. I use it with feline pine pellets. The liner makes changing the box really easy. The thickness is great. Some scratches get through but the bag holds up well. We change it every week on trash day.
customer_reviews.author: M. wong

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: too small for the larger litter boxes but good quality liner
customer_reviews.author: metamondo

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty(my cat hasn't scratched through the plastic) and makes cleaning the litter box a breeze! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: I have used them for the past 2 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used them for the past 2 months and they are definitely worth the extra money. They do not tear which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: JSwailes

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: So large and so durable!!! I am happy to have found these. Will be reordering!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sexton

customer_reviews.title: compared with liners I usually buy.
customer_reviews.text: good value on these litter box liners. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Casper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price. I will use them exclusively.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. I will use them exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit too small for my litter box, but that could be because of the box I have.
customer_reviews.author: Neal H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, most durable litter box liners. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pet and pet extra heavy duty litter box
customer_reviews.text: very reliable, my cat is not declawed and by far this product works better than all the other products ive used for her litter box, so far no rips !
customer_reviews.author: Mindy H

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. My cat has claws and likes to dig in his box frequently. I was amazed at the strength!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... boxes with room to tuck under and are very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: They fit the litter boxes with room to tuck under and are very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Defect in product makes them useless
customer_reviews.text: Bought a three-pack of the liners. Had the same unfortunate experience of the liners spilling down the middle upon installation, rendering them completely useless. Incredible defect in the product. A refund is in order.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best liner bags I have tried
customer_reviews.text: These are the best liner bags I have tried! My 2 cats don't rip them apart like other brands and they're sturdy enough for a lot of litter. Also large enough for our big box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off. Thick strong durable plastic as my cats like to put their claws in it too
customer_reviews.author: janet cooley

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, my cat could not shred. But ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, my cat could not shred. But they did not fit my box. I wish they had a jumbo size.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely superior to any other liners I have used. My two large cats can't rip them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GigiG

customer_reviews.title: I am a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Second time ordering , so far the liners have done their job . They are strong enough to resist the cats scratching through them . I am a satisfied customer ... >^..^<
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: A good start
customer_reviews.text: I think the thickness of the plastic would be fine if the shape of the bag would fit a box shape instead of the envelope shape. Why is it so hard to find a good fitting thick plastic cat pan liner. Contractor trash bags have the correct thickness and are made for sharp objects to be put in them. Make your bags this thick and the correct size and shape and you will have something I have not found to purchase yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Woodal

product_meta.title: PET N PET Cat Litter Box Liners,Drawstring Litter Liner Bags for Litter Box, Extra Large Cat Litter Pan Liners,Heavy Duty Litter Liners Eco Friendly Pet Cat Supplies
feature_bullets: PET N PET Heavy-duty Cat Litter Box Linners,tear-resistant plastic is 60 microns thick,helping to cut down on liners becoming ripped or torn.
Envelop size with dimension 34*18 inch to fit most litter box sizes and styles to help prevent used litter and waste from sticking to cat box.
Each cat litter linner bag is separate,7 Pcs unique neatly folded in a box.total 14 counts
Big"V"shape openning design is easy to take kitty litter bags out.The convenient drawstring makes tossing the litter out easier.
Bags are made from recyclable material, making them an eco-friendly choice and decreasing landfill waste.
